review_content: Czerwone, klarowne piwo o całkiem obfitej pianie, która zdobi szkło i pozostaje do końca w formie warstewki na powierzchni. Aromat nikły. W smaku lekko kwaskowe i lekko słodkie. Goryczka średnia. Ogólnie nic specjalnego, trochę kwaśny napój i tyle w temacie.

Rating this as a beer cocktail and not comparing to proper beer.
Smell- weak, acidic, bit chemical, soft drinik.
Foam- acidic, sugar, sweet, soft drink, faint tequila notes. Head is small, white with a bit of pink tone.
Appearance- simple colorful can, clear ruby color, weak carbonation.
From - snifter
Taste - sugar, soft drink, sweet, artificial, tequila-ish, acidic. Some odd aftertaste to it, not as horrible as some people make it, but below average even when compared to 'beers' in this style. But the more you taste it, the worse it gets.

Pite jakiś czas temu. Ocena w celu uzupełnienia profilu. 
https://www.instagram.com/czgr_

400ml bottle, from an off licence. Red colour + white head. Sweet artificial guarana, cheap tequila, artificial sweetness, cherry Haribos, medicinal, bit sour, some weird almost vomit like acidic note, apparently this cachaca in as well? A complete mess, and pretty gross as well, it's not too bad at first but gets nastier the more you drink. Probably slightly worse than the regular Desperados but they're both pretty grim

Czerwonej barwy, klarowne.
Piana słaba.
W aromacie owocowe.
W smaku słodkie, dużo owoców, trochę goryczki na finiszu.

Saturday, April 25, 2020. Can, 50cL. 5.9%. Purchase ("Intermarché", Airvault (79), FR). Home. #Calisky en galère # solidaire #french admin :) episode (1/3). A sparkling beautiful dark red garnet bubbly clear beer with a medium pinkish head ; short retention.  Chemical candy, "panaché", lemon, red berries juice (elderberry indeed), sugar or maybe aspartam !?, tequila. Medium to heavy round sweet, light acid, medium dry SHORT refreshing. Light ghostly body, thin oily-syrupy texture, average gaseous, no finish (short artificial red berries flavored candies). Overall, bad. Not that easy to drink. Could be worse though. Question : is this still a beer ? I have just tasted 30cL (enough).

11/4/2020. Don't know how we got this, it's been sitting in the fridge quite a while. Thought I'd open it up as it's taking up valuable space. Poured amber red with a bubbly white head. Aroma is sweet syrupy tropical fruit and berries with a a hint of tequila. Sweet to taste. Sticky texture, average carbonation. Glad it's gone. it was kind of ok.
Not a bad taste but for sure it has a lot lf sugar and additives, not a real beer.

(bottle 0,33l from Levné Potraviny Brno) Overall: Exotic fruity lemonade.
 Aroma: Light sweet, exotic fruity, artificial.
 Appearance: Clear amber-pink. Medium, white head.
 Taste: Very sweet, exotic fruity, artificial, light harsh, light tequila.
 Palate: Fizzy. Some harsh/bitter finish.
Sporo było wypitego piwa swojego czasu. historyczna opinia i ocena z pamięci.
Geprobeerd met LiekevdV. Het is een helder rood bier met een dun schuim. Het heeft een zoete geur. De smaak is zoet, chemisch en Tequila achtig.
Dopóki zimne to taki spoko napój, nieco za słodki, ale nie taki zły. Po ociepleniu zły. Wg mnie lepszy od niektórych lagerów, mimo że nie do końca to jest piwo w ogóle.
good beer has in bottle would buy again had cold poured into glass good taste nice appearence

Аромат пряный, похож на бруснику или калину, легкая травянистость. Цвет красный, пена белая, средняя по размеру, шипит как Шнапс. Вкус странный, слегка горьковатый, ягодный. Послевкусие со странной горчинкой. В целом не ужасно, но и второй раз я не куплю.
Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji w ramach uzupełnienia profilu.

Czerwone, klarowne piwo o całkiem obfitej pianie, która zdobi szkło i pozostaje do końca w formie warstewki na powierzchni. Aromat nikły. W smaku lekko kwaskowe i lekko słodkie. Goryczka średnia. Ogólnie nic specjalnego, trochę kwaśny napój i tyle w…

Rating this as a beer cocktail and not comparing to proper beer. Smell- weak, acidic, bit chemical, soft drinik. Foam- acidic, sugar, sweet, soft drink, faint tequila notes. Head is small, white with a…

Pite jakiś czas temu. Ocena w celu uzupełnienia profilu. 
https://www.instagram.com/czgr_

400ml bottle, from an off licence. Red colour + white head. Sweet artificial guarana, cheap tequila, artificial sweetness, cherry Haribos, medicinal, bit sour, some weird almost vomit like acidic note, apparently this cachaca in as well? A complete mess,…
Czerwonej barwy, klarowne. Piana słaba. W aromacie owocowe.…

Saturday, April 25, 2020. Can, 50cL. 5.9%. Purchase ("Intermarché", Airvault (79), FR). Home. #Calisky en galère # solidaire #french admin :) episode (1/3). A sparkling beautiful dark red garnet bubbly clear beer with a medium pinkish head ; short…

11/4/2020. Don't know how we got this, it's been sitting in the fridge quite a while. Thought I'd open it up as it's taking up valuable space. Poured amber red with a bubbly white head. Aroma is sweet syrupy tropical fruit and berries with a a hint of tequila.…
Not a bad taste but for sure it has a lot lf sugar and additives, not a real beer.
(bottle 0,33l from Levné Potraviny Brno) Overall: Exotic fruity lemonade. Aroma: Light sweet, exotic fruity, artificial.…
Sporo było wypitego piwa swojego czasu. historyczna opinia i ocena z pamięci.
Geprobeerd met LiekevdV. Het is een helder rood bier met een dun schuim. Het heeft een zoete geur. De smaak is zoet, chemisch en Tequila achtig.
Dopóki zimne to taki spoko napój, nieco za słodki, ale nie taki zły. Po ociepleniu zły. Wg mnie lepszy od niektórych lagerów, mimo że nie do końca to jest piwo w ogóle.
good beer has in bottle would buy again had cold poured into glass good taste nice appearence

Аромат пряный, похож на бруснику или калину, легкая травянистость. Цвет красный, пена белая, средняя по размеру, шипит как Шнапс. Вкус странный, слегка горьковатый, ягодный. Послевкусие со странной горчинкой. В целом не…
Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji w ramach uzupełnienia profilu.
Zoet van smaak met veel bessen. De link naar bier en Desperados is niet meer te vinden. -backlog de BierApp-

Kolor: Różowo-rubinowy, klarowny. Piana: Biała, dość obfita, drobnopęcherzykowa, szybko redukuje się do pierścienia. Zapach: Słodki, czerwone owoce, ale bardziej jak jakaś oranżada albo napój i nieco alkoholu. Smak: Słodki, znowu czerwone owoce w stlu herbatki granulowanej, guarana, lekki alkohol, minimalna cierpkość. Spore wysycenie, niska treściwość, piwo jest wodniste. Raczej tylko do znietrzeźwienia się.
Botella 0,33l Rojiza,espuma rosada,fina,moderada,poca resistencia.Aroma frutal dominante.Sabor frutal,dulce,alcohol.Regular
Czuć drożdżowego trzcinowe aromaty z cachacy, alkoholowe, słodowe, czuć wiśniowo teuskawkowy sztuczny aromat. Dość mocno słodkie jak i kwasowe jednocześnie. Bardzo słabe

33cl bottle.
Thin off white head. Clear light red colour. Sweet and bland. Not great but that's no surprise....
Un panaché coloré, très sucré. Ce n'est pas réellement de la bière. Un jus de chaussette pour gonzesses!

resin, dough, barnyard, cheese, basement aromas, leather, earthy, leaves, caramel, hay, chocolate, cough drop, alcohol, cooked vegetables, banana, soy sauce, skunky, smoke, vanilla, woody, butterscotch, clove, cooked vegetables, rotten eggs,

Butelka 17.10.18
Aromat: truskawka, jak truskawkowa guma Mamba, słodka oranżada
Wygląd: czerwone, przejrzyste
Smak: słodkie, jak czerwona oranżada
Dość duże nagazowanie, napój dobry np. na grilla
Smakuje dobrze, z desperadosów chyba najlepszy.

Regular lager with odd, but somewhat interesting syrup flavoring. Even packs a little bit of bitterness, though it's coupled with alcohol flavor. Not too good, but unique enough that I'm not going to complain.

400 ml bottle. Clear red color with thin white head. Smells quarana and some cranberry. Taste disappointed some sweet lemonade no notes of tequila or beer. Guarana makes that shandy taste like cheap energy drink. No aftertaste. Best thing is appearance. Cool looking bottle.

btl. 40cl bb 29.5.18. Zapach szmaciano-slodowy. Lepsze od podstawki ;) Slodkie i lekko goryczkowe. Na pierwszym planie cierpki czarny bez, czerwona porzeczka, marchewka. Dosc kwasne. Syropowo-owocowe z guaranową (?) goryczką.
Neuvěřitelný marketový patvar, který snad nestojí ani pořádně za větší recenzi...
Encore pire que celle de base,  trop de goût tue le goût,  il n'y a plus de place pour la bière dedans
For an out-of-this-world Shandy type beer it does the trick - but is slightly too sweet and the unusual here is not overwelming.
Słodkie, owocowe, mogło być gorzej. (Ocena przeniesiona z innego piwnego portalu).
Butelka 0,66 l. Minimalnie gorsze niż oryginał. Te piwa to jednak ciężka katorga.
Tu już nie ma aż takiego posmaku żula. Soczek trochę maskuje, aczkolwiek dużo to nie pomaga
Barwa czerwono-różowa, niezła piana. Aromaty tequili, guarany. Alkohol schowany za ścianą cukru, praktycznie jak sok owocowy. Generalnie nic ciekawego, ale można wypić z braku innych opcji.

Różowe, piana nie za wysoka i dość szybko opada. Aromat dobrze wyczuwalny, czuć guarane, ładny owocowy aromat. Duże wysycenie. W smaku lemoniada, bardzo dobrze ukryty alkohol. Bardziej oranzada niż piwo. Jak na styl który nie jest dla mnie piwem, to smakuje fajnie, z sentymentu do desperados wysoka ocena.

Bottle from Saint Martin. Clear reddish amber pour with a foamy off-white head and great retention. Very good lacing. Flat mouthfeel. Strange tequila and sour fruit taste. Not a fan. 5.9 ABV is well hidden.
Kun je niet echt bier noemen, lichte tequila na maak maar voor mij te zoet.

Różowa barwa, piana różowawa, średnio obfita, drobnopęcherzykowa, szybko opada, zostawia lacing.
Aromat słodki, sztuczne aromaty tequili, guarany, landrynki, lekki dms.
W smaku słodkie, owocowe - jabłkowe, czerwone owoce, guarana, aromat tequili, aldehyd octowy, lekki alkohol na finiszu. Goryczka niska, wyczuwalna. Wysycenie średnio-wysokie. Odczucie nieco gęstszego napoju gazowanego.
33cl bottle. Clear red with a pinkish white head. Tequila and artificial berries juice. Is there any beer in it?
Pozdrowienia z Pomorskiego dla wszystkich pijących i nie pijących :) Polecam

The aroma hints of red soda with a bit of lager yeast and malts. 

It pours a rose colored body with a pink frothy head. 

Taste is sweet, sour and sweet again. Red berries; slight strawberry, raspberry. 

Light mouthfeel. Watery. 

This aint real beer.
Rot im Glas mit guter Krone. Muffiger Geruch. Süsslich säuerlicher Geschmack. Nicht Gut!

0.5 bottle @ home 
 Even sweeter than the normal desperados, very fruity indeed. Tastes like a beer with added juice. Not particularly good but refreshing.

330ml bontle
Appearance: reddish body with a fizz softdrinkish grey head.
Aroma: artificial Oranges, artificial tequilla.
Taste: sweet, orange tones, tequila tones, and some other other stuff.
Thin body, sugary water, sticky texture, high carbonation.

The original was better.
Backlog rating.
Wypite dawno temu, ocena w ramach uzupelnienia profilu. Sama slodycz i pytanie, ile w tym jest prawdziwego piwa, o ile w ogole cokolwiek
[Archive] Sweet aroma of berries, bit of juice. Clear ruby in the glass, medium snow-white head. Taste of currant, some berries, bit of tartness. Why is it called "beer"?
Backlog. Przenoszenie ocen z innego serwisu, z czasów przed założeniem konta na ratebeer
Backlog, ocena przepisana z untappd, w ramach uzupełniania profilu na ratebeer.
500ml Dose. Klar und rötlich mit minimaler Schaumkrone. Starker, chemischer Energy-Geschmack. Sehr süß.

Na wstępie mam proste pytanie... Co to mianowicie jest? Rozważanie to pochłonęło mnie bardziej niż sam omawiany likwor. W aromacie estry imitujące nuty owocowe, bardzo słodkie, jakaś mdląca mgiełka przypominająca kibel. W smaku tona cukru, jakaś malina z soku do herbaty, alkohol, jak syropek na kaszel. Potworne.
Piwo butelkowe. Lekka piana d?ugoutrzymuj?ca si?. Barwa czerwona. Smakuje jak oren?ada.
Butelka, piana jest, aromat owocowy, kolor czerwony, s?odkie, wodniste, jak oranzada

Uzupełnienie profilu

Czuć sok z czerwonych owoców. Kwaśnawe akcenty, wysokie wysycenie. Trochę kukurydzy i syropu. Moim zdaniem chyba najlepszy z Desperadosów, nic specjalnego, ale schłodzony ugasi pragnienie
Bottle @ The Brun Lea, Burnley. Mid clear red with a thick bubbly head. Has a mild sweet aroma and taste with the tequila et al providing a flavour that’s not overbearing. Has a sticky-sweet texture.

Lukt: Sitron.

Utseende: Rødbrun.

Skum/kullsyre: Dekkende skum.

Smak: Sitronbrus.

Hvor: Moon on the Square, Feltham.

Medium: Flaske@330ml, ABV@5,9%, Når@30.06.2016
Bottled, 330ml at a Wetherspoons, just a small sample for me. Pink with mo head. There is an astringent perfumed nose leading to an artificial fruity, floral flavour. Pretty disgusting.

Pours clear light red with a medium frothy white head that quickly settles. Aromas of rye bread, raspberry, perfume, artificial fruit flavours, chili. Taste is artificial winegum, booze, raspberry, moldy cellar.

Pours clear red with low light pink head 
Aromas of raspberry like dish water, womit, ajax for metallic surfaces
Ok Lets try the taste then. Well lets go for some aromatised raspberry tequila . Horrible just horrible

Pours clear red with low light pink head. Aroma has distinct notes of two things; first there is latex, and not just a wee bit of latex, no this smells like I imagine one of those less classy porn stores would smell, complete with the smell of the sad desperation of its patrons; second, there is vomit, as if one of the patrons of the porn establishment threw up just before going inside. This is by far the worst aroma I’ve ever experienced in a beer. Taste is surprisingly good considering the mayhem this "beer" just caused on my nose. Artificial winegums, booze, god this is bad...! Body is light and smooth (?) with I suppose soft carbonation.
I’ve had worse, but not in England. Poured from a bottle. Now I know why they were 2/£5. Apple juice appearance. No discernable aroma but tastes like bad fruit punch.
33cl bottle. Pours clear orange red colour with a mid-sized light reddish head. Aroma of sweet fruits, chemicals. Taste of sugar, red berries, citrons, chemcial, meh...

Spróbować można, jednakże z piwem ma to malo wspólnego. Pachnie i smakuje dziwnie. Jakieś takie kwaśne. Jak lemoniada, goryczki równie dużo.

-- rated with beerbasher/winphone
Can 0,5ltr: Clear red colored softdrink-like beverage taste not bad if you think its that, but somehow its a beer and on this site its kind of bad.

This is not beer, this is strawberry juice at best, and bad one overall. When you see on a bottle "Ingredients: Beer [...]", you know you’re going for a wild and adventurous trip. Avoid, you’ll not even get drunk with this ! DISAPPROVED BY TAVERNY’S BLACK METAL CREW !

Butelka 400 ml; z tequilą, ponadto z guaraną i cachacą. Podobnie jak Desperados Nocturno - ciężko to rozpatrywać w kategoriach piwa, bo to tak jak kolega z pracy. Niby kolega, ale jednak z pracy. Bliżej mu do radlerów albo cydrów niż do porównań z piwem. Jakkolwiek - do wypicia. Minimalnie lepsze od wersji Nocturno.

Can from WB stores, West Bromwich. Poured in my Kasteel trappist glass, because I don’t drink enough real Belgians. Reddish pink beer with small head. Aroma of red fruit and light malt. Taste is red fruit, some light tartness, malt and sweetness. A little tequila is hidden in there somewhere. I quite enjoyed this one.
Fruchtiger Alkopop sehr beerig, wer ein Bier erwartet ist selbst schuld, mir hats trotzdem besser als so manches pils geschmeckt.

Początkowo chciałem wystawić wyższą ocenę (o 1), ale po przeanalizowaniu wszystkich faktówm doszedłem do wniosku, że jedynym atutem tego "piwa" jest piana. I tylko dlatego, że się pojawiła - biała, puszysta. Trzeba dobrego refleksu, żeby to zaobserwować, bo piana szybko pozostała wspomnieniem. Kolor ciemnoczerwony - wygląda dość nienaturalnie. Cała reszta to jakieś nieporozumienie! Aromat landrynek i innych sztucznych mieszanek owocowych. W smaku piwa z pewnością to nie przypomina... Ale że czasem jestem skłonny wyrwać się ze sztywnych ram i potraktować trunek w kategorii napoju, tak też uczyniłem w przypadku Desperados Red. Niestety. I w tej kategorii jest słabo. Napój jest niesmaczny, wodnisty. Nie da się wyczuć żadnego konkretnego smaku, choć w składzie są koncentraty soków. Jest też ekstrakt guarany, a o tequili nic nie wspomniano. Produkt koszmarnie sztuczny i paskudny. Dziwne jest to, że piłem tegoż Desperadosa nie dalej niż 1,5 roku temu i raczej dobrze go wspominałem (jak na napój). Ale teraz radzę omijać z daleka!!
Een frisdrankachtige smaak, waarin bier een ondertoon heeft. Hoofdzakelijk is een bessenachtige, licht zoete smaak aanwezig. Op de achtergrond het licht bittere van een pilsener.

(Desperados Red) Bottle 330 ml at home, served into a shaker, ABV 5.9%
Bright red colour on the body, crystal clear, with a small and thin head on top, good retention though.Fruity aroma, berries, lime, lemon flowers.
Taste is sweet, wiht sugars, red fruits, lime, lemon flowers, Sprite, berries, syrup/
Medium thin body, high caarbonation.
Good as a refreshment, not as good as a beer, but it can pass as a soft drink while it has a 5.9% alcohol so that’s something.

F: huge, lasting, off-white.
C: coppery, clear.
A: sweet fruitiness, some cherries, hint of lemon.
T: red tangerine sweetness, red apples peels, fruitiness, some bitterness on the palate, hint of alcohol, medium body, good carbonated, 0,5l can from Carrefour in Les Saintes in Guadeloupe, as for beer not good one, but as a radler ok.

0,33 l Flasche. Aroma: Rote Beeren, säuerlich, etwas künstlich. Erscheinung: Rotes Bier, weniger, leicht rosa Schaum, der aber eine schöne Gardine bildet. Geschmack: Säuerlich, leicht süß, leicht bitter nach Grapefruit, kein Biergeschmack, vielleicht ein Hauch von Tequila. Nachgeschmack: Pelzige Zunge, kurz anhaltender säuerlich, bitterer Geschmack. Gesamt: Geschmacklich kein Bier, aber ein trinkbares Getränk, da nicht zu süß.
*Süßlich komisch. Viel chemischen rote Beeren, ein Hauch Tequila im Hintergrund, süßlich-künstlich...

400ml bottle from Beers of Europe. Pours a bright red colour like a berry fruit cider, small pinkish head that disappears quickly. Aroma is similar to standard Desperados bordering on a tropical cocktail. Taste is sweet and fruity, a bit artificial/chemically, I didn’t enjoy the addition of cachaça and guarana to the tequila, these flavours are probably great in a cocktail but I’m not sure they work well in a lager. Would rather have original Desperados.
7th October 2015.
Barwa czerwona. Pachnie słodko, owocowo. W smaku słodkie, lekko owocowe, na koniec gorzkawe. Najlepszy desperados

Piwo bursztynowe, miedziane. Piana drobno i średnopęchrerzykowa, redukuje się do obrączki. Miejscami nawet oblepia szkło. Aromat sfermentowanych owoców, szybko się ulatnia (albo węch szybko się przyzwyczaja). W smaku słodkie, lekko kwaskowe. Wysycenie wysokie.
Bottle 400 ml. Worse than standard version. Tastes like some mediocre juice with alcohol.

The beer has a bright red color. It is clear and first have much foam. It looks like grenadine syrup. The smell has some berries in it. There also is the typical desperado aroma, fresh and lemony. The taste is not very strong though. The smell is very sweet, just like the taste. To sweet maybe. The taste is very fruity. I taste grenadine syrup as well. The beer is nice, but it’s more like grenadine syrup.

Pours a clear red color, topped with a small pink(ish)-white head, no retention. Fruits aroma, sweet berries, lemon and citruses. Taste is sweet and sugary, acidic. Not bad for a juicy drink, but not for beer.
Burk 50 cl i polen. Klarröd med vitt skum. Obehaglig doft av dålig lager och saft. Syrlig, besk och söt på samma gång.

Cervesa on la única funció és refrescar, té un toc dolç que la pot fer perillosa.
Cerveza donde la única función es refrescar, tiene un toque dulce que la puede hacer peligrosa.
Bottle thanks to allmyvinyl. It’s definitely like fruit squash but it is quite refreshing, all the same. BenH loves these beers!
Bottle. Red with pink head. Aroma is fruity, lemonade. Taste if lemonade, orange, little earthy in the finish. Quite refreshing
Pours pink and clear. Smells like lager. Taste is sweet, some weird acidic fruit and some malt sweetness.
Bottle at home. Pours clear reddish, nose is lemon and lime, grassy, taste is sickly sugar, grassy, salty.
Bottle at home... All blame to james... Red pink... Soft grassy.. Soft berries nose... Soft juicy.. Soft grassy linger.. Light grassy grapefruit linger

Desperado, why don’t you come to your senses?
You been out chasin’ ratings for so long now.
Oh, you’re a hard one, 
But I know that you’ve got your reasons. 
These things that are pleasin’ you, 
Can hurt you somehow.

Don’t you drink the queen of diamonds, boy,
She’ll beat you if she’s able.
Know the queen of hearts is always your best bet.
Now it seems to me, some fine things, 
Have been laid upon your table. 
But you only want the things that you can’t get.

Desperado, oh, you ain’t gettin’ no younger: 
Your pain and your thirst, well, they’re drivin’ you home. 
And freedom, oh freedom,
Well, that’s just some people drinkin’ 
Your prison is rating,
Through this world all alone. 



Pours clear red, thin white-pink head. Aromas of synthetic fruit. Taste is just like the cherries & berries cordial I give the kids. "Aromatized"!. Sticky finish. 


(With apologies to the estate of Johnny Cash.)

Bright berry red with a pinkish head. Synthetic malty aniseed sugary nose. Gritty bitter, harsh synthetic leathery dryness. Decent carbonation. Finishes itchy sweet and a weird herby buzz linger. Bottle, Constitution.
400 ml, butelka. Aromaty żadne, lagerowe, soku. W smaku cienkie, słodkie, jakbym pił sok. Pijalne, wysycenie niskie. Ogólnie bez wad ale kompletnie nic specjalnego.

600ml bottle (Petrol Station in Poland)

Clear glass bottle, so docking a point for that. The contents are glow in the dark red, and pour fizzy. Annoyed me on the first sip - a quote: "Aww fuck, actually it’s not *that* bad. Lemony bullshit". However, the subsequent sips’ taste is eughh! Crappy pale lager with sugar, chemical lime additives. Scary. Really awful concoction, total horror. But amazingly not a bad as some others it shares the style with.

500ml bottle. As soon as I saw you, so bright like christmas tree, in that supermarket at Zywiec, I knew I have to have you. I wanted you so bad, like polish police tourists. You didn’t disappoint me when I tasted you. You was just like I imagined. You gonna live long in my memories. And nightmares.

0.4l clear bottle. No expectations here at all. It stars off by pouring a actually quite good looking warm amber bronze colored crystal clear body with a medium sized really lacing reddish hue head. The nose is not completely horrible, it’s pretty awful but in a curious way what you can call sniffable. Red sweet cacti, herbs, artificial berries and dead flies. Oh, it’s one of those complete complete undrinkable ones. Oh, my. THIS has to be the worst tasting beer I’ve ever had the pleasure of pouring down my throat. It’s just beyond words trying to describe how horrible this tastes. It’s muddy, yeasty, super cloying, artificial and it’s making my face do horrible things to itself. No, I honestly think this has to be Nr 1 on the bad tasting scale. All-time. 04.08.2014

40 cl bottle @ VastActiv

Aroma has fruit juice, lemomade and grapefruit juice. Flavour has grapefruit lemonade, some fruit candy and harsh bitter notes. This is too bitter for a lemonade and too lemony bitter for a beer. Useless.

(Bottle, 0.4 l, courtesy of FatPhil, 20141122) The beer poured red and clear. Its head wasn’t there. Aroma had strawberry soda and chilli sauce. Palate was light bodied with medium carbonation. Flavours were fruit juice, citricness, sweetness and more sweetness. Aftertaste was sweet. A pointless brew.

330ml bottle



Pours red with a smooth head. Aroma of artificial flavors, spices and sweet lemonade. Taste is sweet, stuffy and artificial with notes of berries and lemonade. Finish is sweet and sugary with artificial lemonade notes. Baaaaad.

Bottle 0.5l at home, Helsinki. Thanks to Marduk/FatPhil. Colour is clear red with no head. Aromas and flavours: Sweetness, berries, strawberries, soda and artificial sugar. This is no beer. Stop manufacturing this kind of shit.

New version of the infamous Desperados, with not just tequila flavour added, but also cachaça (Brazilian rhum) and guarana (a caffeine-producing South American plant popular in energy drinks and the like), as well as industrial citric acid - and the expected tons of sugar. Poured from a 50 cl can, it displays a pure but misty copper colour and a medium thick, off-white head with pinkish hue, sticky and more or less stable, though reduced to a lace and ’islands’ in the middle after a while. The nose gets industrial lemon juice from a bottle, ice tea, energy drink, orange lemonade, grenadine, brown rhum and a lot of white sugar, but nothing in the aroma even remotely says ’beer’. The taste is a lot like some Coca Cola Company soda pop: artificial sugary citrus combined with ascorbid acid. Strong carbo with minerally effect further adds to this effect. Energy drink (Red Bull style - a drink I have detested ever since it came onto the market) is apparent too, as a result of the guarana; in the finish, faint hints of rhum and perhaps vague tequila appear with a bitterish, artificial, chemical, somewhat wry effect which is only tempered by an awfully cloying sugary sweetness; the artifical acidity further dries the mouth. Again: almost no actual beer taste, just a weak hint of pale malts far away in the background. Of all the beer styles around, flavoured pale lagers from transparent longneck bottles or showy cans are by far my least favourite; I had expected this to be the worst beer I was ever going to taste, but it disgusted me just a little bit less than the regular version (I hasten to stress "a little bit"). Still: ghastly and only appealing to people who don’t actually like the taste of real beer.  Very obnoxious too, the sweetness stuck to my teeth and palate for a very long time, blocking my abilities to taste real beers.  One point off for ruining my evening!
Can @ RBBSG, 2014. Clear red, artificial color. Aroma of chemical lemonade. Same goes for the taste. Sucks big time.
Wait, is this really beer? It tastes more like a soda pop. As a soda I’d give this a 3.3. As a beer? Not so much.
Oranżada podszywająca się pod piwo. Da się pić, smak niezgorszy, ale po co to pić?
50 cl. can. Pink colour with an off-white head. Aroma and flavour of berries, spice, guarana and tequila.
Een bier dat het midden houdt tussen redbull en bier. Als je van redbull houdt is dit wel lekker
Can. Bright pink color. Aroma of medicine. Taste is sweet and medicinal. Why?
Bottle from an off license; strawberry juice red with a thin bubbly white head, fruit aroma, taste is tip top strawberry with jam, very sweet and terrible.

Can from the international food store in Eastbourne. Pours out in a light ruby-pink-red colour with low head and thin body. Aroma of berries and cheap juice. Taste of artifical, too sweet strawberries, sugar, leaves, soda and artifical juice syrup. Awful stuff and absolutely undrinkable.

Bottle from @International Shop@ in Eastbourne shared with McTapps. Tough one. I mean, there are beers and there are fruit @beers@. Fruit beers should not be mentioned in the same sentence as a beer. This one makes no exception. It is a berry drink, artificial of course, mixed up with some alcohol. Trash.

CAN at RBSG 2014. Thx to everyone for sharing today’s bottles!
APPEARANCE: clear red beer, small unstable reddish head.
NOSE: cherries, watery, though fruity.
TASTE: watery, lemonade, bad.
Can @ RBBSG, 2014. Red colour. Medium carbonation. Aroma of red fruit, lemonade and toilet cleaner. Chemical and artificial taste. Horrible.
Sampled from can @ RBBSG III. Fluorescent reddish color, small white head. Smell and taste candy, chemical, sweetness and indeed some tequila flavors. Oh well, what was to expect from this huh?
It’s hard to rate this bavrage as a beer. Mix of this aromatizers give it the taste of orangeade.

400 ml bottle. BB 02/12/2014. From a gas station in Paczków, Poland. 
Clear red colour with a big foamy head.
The aroma is blood orange, malt and some medicine. The flavour is bad. Some fruits, soda, sweetness and mild alcohol in the aroma. Bad. 


---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Les femmes ont une inénarable propention à aimer de la merde sucrée, et en général, la despé red est leur passion pendant 2 mois... Bref c’est horrible
Een heerlijke Desperados die behoorlijk zoet is maar niet overheerst. Smaken van tropisch fruit en tequilla maken dit een ideale dorstlesser tijdens de warme dagen.

21/IV/14 - 33cl bottle from a local supermarket (Gent) @ home - BB: who cares, probably still good cause I just bought it a month ago or so (2014-379) 


Clear dark orange to pale red beer, creamy aery light pink head, little stable, bit adhesive. Aroma: very sugary, citric, artificial lemonade, artificial fruitiness. MF: ok carbon, medium body (probably from all the sugar). Taste: sugary sweet start, bit lemony, lime and lemonade, very sweet, artificial flavouring. Reminds me of cactus flavoured jenever. Aftertaste: little bitter, lemony, sugary sweet lemonade with funky flavours. Oh well, my sister in law was happy with it.
Bottled: 400ml. # Generic candy flavoured chick stuff : I’m a fan of regular desperados, this is too sweet for my palate

smells of BO which is slightly off putting, looks just like some kind of industrial waste tastes the same with a alcoholic chemical aftertaste, worse than the normal desperados. avoid unless out to get smashed and its cheap.
Alors celle-là, en plus par rapport à sa grande sœur classique, elle a goût bien dégueulasse. Vraiment très mauvais.
at my home 0.50l can red amber coloured body with an off white head and a spicy fruity hop aroma a sweet fruity hop taste a sweet alcholic little bitter finish

Bottled	27/12/13. A pinky red coloured beer with a bright white head. A far away noticed sweet and skunky energy drink aroma. Sweet artificial and sickly in the mouth with more of that energy drink nonsense. Saccharine. Thin but not thin enough. Why is this even made?

in beer, you have whales, and - lets call the other opposite - ants . just like ants the animal, ants the doesnt matter. down upon . wether you like it, doesnt matter. you SHOULD score it badly .( think of low alcohol, sweetened beers, ... ) just like whales are suposed to be rater 4 + . i will NOT join this way of rating . i always rate according to how much i enjoy it , the whole package . looks ( also label) , smell, mouthfeel, taste , aftertaste . thats how i’ve always done it, and always WILL do it . 

so yeah, lets open our minds and lets not expect a beer of something that doesnt even call itself a beer . its a mix . itsd a drink . do you enjoy it ? appart from IS it a beer or not ? here’s what i thought : 

i drank it from the bottle at ’t rotske ( metalbar in antwerp, the owner is a fan of this ) . colour is as seen on the picture. dindt pour it out . 
smell is sweet
carbonation is like a soda . very arteficial . taste reminds me of bacardi breezer wattermelon . the first alcoholic beverage i ever enjoyed . every few months, i even sneak in the stores , disguised, and buy a bottle . yes, i do have to admit i like this . i do NOT like how arteficial this tastes like, but what it does taste like, is not bad at all . watermelon comes to mind, on a bit of a malty base . maybe somewhat sweetened . no complexity, nothing a BEER should be like . but as a drink, this is damn fine . 

think of this rating ( or me) what you will, but i’ll set a spine here , and rate this 3,5 . as much as i rate mpy average beer . why so high ? simply enough cause i can enjoy this as much as the average beer . ( stuff that taste the same as 20000 other beers ) . so yeah ... 9 percent on style ? i think thats a bit influenced by rathing this as an ’ ant’ .

Canned, 0.50l. Clear amber orange color with large dissipating frothy pinkish head and sparkling appearance. Aroma of grainy malt, tequila, guarana and other artificial crap. Taste is artificial sweet, mild fruity, alcoholic and moderate unpleasant bitter. Light body, dry texture and fizzy carbonation in palate. That’s an insult for beer lovers...

50 cl. can @ home. BBF 08/2014. Procured from Carrefour. Last can at the store, score! First sighting of one of the variations. Beer aromatized with tequila, cachaça and guarana, sounds fascinating terrible. The can looks lovely, energy drink styled can. This stuff is not cheap, looking at the ABV, the buzz / price ratio doesn’t seem to be on par with the stronger Gordon’s which are in a comparable price-range. This one is more of an alcopop, those usually don’t have the highest ABV & are quite pricey as well. There is that, now it is time to taste this puppy. Poured ice-cold into my Eylenbosch glass, it’s a amber pomegranate pink, creamy, collapsing soapy head, very light shade of pink. Nose is basically huge artificial sweeteners, not very off-putting, totally artificial strawberry additives, lime, guarana, totally unidentifiable red fruits, flavourings & additives, gummy bears, faint tequila. Taste is lots of artificial sweeteners, including aspartame, guarana, lime, artificial cheap tequila, quinine, light jam, unidentifiable red fruit additives including strawberry, sorbet, more artificial additives in the back, touch sweeteners chemical sourness, slight burn. Light, almost watery, hint higher carb. Absolutely nothing about this identifies this like a beer to me, def. not nasty like the regular version. You can drink this like an energy drink. If you want to get buzzed & not taste any alcohol or alcohol-like drink this might be the way to go for you. 100 % artificial but not off-putting, I have had quite a few less pleasing “pale lagers’. I wouldn’t actually call this off-putting even, I had no issue finishing this.
Aroma of stale chemical fruit candy. Flavour of stale chemical fruit candy. Bit of a bothersome alcohol burn.

Belle couleur rouge, grosse mousse blanche. Parfum de fruits confits... artificiels. Arome cerise-agrume-aspartam. Gout sucré aspartam-artificiel. Pas degueulasse, mais pour ceux qui aiment pas la bière en soirée.

Bottle. Red with a thin foam. Aromas are soapy with bubblegum and medicinal notes. Cherry with tequila and sour sweets. Flavours are haribo sweets with red bull and a chemical finish. Syrupy sweet with some sour. Not one I would want another of.

Clear 400ml bottle: BBD 30 Dec 2013. This bottle was bought in an iffy Asian Supermarket close to where I live, however it would appear the bottle has had an exciting life. The bottom of the front label claims: License of HBBV, The Netherlands and the rear label was all in Polish, I wonder how it ended up in Shropshire?

This beer was supposed to consumed on the 6th Aug 2013 during ’Shitty Beer Night’, but I’d had 6 awful brews and couldn’t face this one too.

Anyway, 7th Aug 2013 sees me poured this into a UK pint sleeve.

I already knew it was red by the name and the see through nature of it’s bottle. The head came out pink and faded fairly swiftly.

The nose and taste are both exceedingly sweet with heavily sugared strawberries appearing to be the main culprit. Sickly, cheap Tequila notes add to the nausea and general feeling of ’alcopop’.

Not a nice drink: but better than all the other 6 beers I had the night before!
Fruity-sweet aroma, a taste of sweetness and tequila, tequila also on the palate, a very small hint of bitterness, head disappears quickly. Quite refreshing, although a bit too sweet.

Bought this at a Kiwi Mart in Phnom Penh for the tick. What the hell is wrong with me? Smells and tastes like someone pissed into one of those red energy drinks and bottled it. At least the regular Desperados had a bit of lemon but this is just nasty. If people like cheap pale lagers, fine, they like the taste of corn, it’s all subjective. But this beer is objectively bad. I’d rather eat Cambodian duck fetus than have another one of these.

Ja den ännu rätt röd, får man ändå ge den ! Sen, är detta verkligen en öl? Hade lika väl kunnat stå "Bacardi Tropical Fruit" på flaskan. Aroma och smak artificiella bär. Tequila, nja vet inte riktigt?!

Where do i start? It’s a red foamy mess that looks like soft drink. Smells like a alcopop shocker, fake strawberry flavour. Taste is fake berry flavour with a note of cough syrup. Look, it’s 5.9% abv and has guarana so the kids can get smashed on it and stay up all night, but really, it’s just awful.

330ml bottle [Thanx Dennis]. Clear reddish amber colour with small, collapsing, white head. Artificial fruity aroma has notes of strawberry and lime. Taste is sweet, notes of artificial sweetener, citric acid, artificial strawberry and similar flavours. Beer?

Bottle @ Home. Pours reddish dark amber with a offwhite / very light pink head. Aroma of artificial red fruit, cherry, grapefruit. Flavor of sweet sodalike, artificial fruit, artificial sweeteners, light citrusly. Thin body, lively carbonation. Actually drinkable and kindof refreshing in a Fanta / Cola like way. 100213

Bottle at the ChrisO Holiday Tasting, London - thanks to some unkind individual. Pours clear pink with a fine, white foam head. Fruity-berry malt nose, light bread. Big sugary flavor, berries. LIght to medium bodied with average carbonation. Sugary finish, somewhat artificial, light bitterness, lasting fruits. Meh. To borrow the words of harrisoni: "i mean its rubbish but i love the child sweet thing."
Can. Red-orange colour with a pink head. Aroma is sour, sweet berries, cherry coke mixed with fant. Flavour is sugar, cherry coke mixed with fanta and malt. Why ?

Bottle at Chriso’s tasting in London, 121230. Amber/redfish color with a small offwhite head. Shandy aroma, fruity, sweet, guarana, citrus, strawberries, minerals. Strawberry flavor, sugary, too sweet, cherry notes, citrus notes, sugary, very sugary.
Bottle at Chriso New Year 2012/13.  aroma of cherry shandy. i mean its rubbish but i love the fruit child sweet thing. its quite sweet but not terrible
Red with a pinkish slick of head. Wham bar and shower gel aroma. Sourish, berry sherbet flavour with some card chucked in for good measure. Cheap jammy dodger hints to finish. Somehow drinkable.
400ml bottle at 6%.  Pours pinky, reddy brown with a thin head.  Aroma is cough sweets, guarana and orange.  Taste is sweet, with orange and guarana in the finish.  Alcopop fizzy mouthfeel.

330 ml can. A reddish amber body with a big, creamy off-white head. Have to admit it looks quite fantastic. Strong aroma of artificial fruit and berries with soda pop. No beer in the aroma, but I wasn’t expecting that either so it’s a bit difficult to put a score on this. To be a nonsense funnybunny wannabe fruity something beer the aroma is not unpleasant. The flavor on the other hand is awful, just synthetic fruit and soda pop. Like Coke mixed with a fruit drink. Weak body and the aftertaste is just as disgusting than the flavor itself. No beverage for humans.

Can. It’s a clear, reddish orange beer topped by a small, dense, off-white head. Fruity, citrusy nose with white sugar. Something malty in the back, but most of all it’s artificial. It’s soft on the palate, quite thin. Artificial flavor with generic fruityness and citrus. Quite sweet, both initially and in the end. A rather horrific one, at least from a beery perspective. 121017
Can, courtesy of Beer3000. Pours deep golden with a reddish hue and an off-white head. Aroma of fanta and cherry coke. Flavor is sweet tea with some soda and guarana. Not a hint of beer in this one.

Can 500ml @ Geokkjer

Pours clear amber with a off-white head. Aroma has notes of orange and cherries. Taste medium sweet and light bitter with a very fruity finish. Body is light, texture is thin to oily, carbonation is soft.

Can 500ml. @ PBF2012.

Clear light to medium amber red colour with a small to average, frothy, fair lacing, fully diminishing, off-white head. Aroma is moderate malty, fruity, artificial fruit, guarana. Flavour is moderate toheavy sweet with a average to long duration, fresh, guarana - cachaÃ§a, artificial. Body is medium, texture is watery, carbonation is soft. [20120727]
Thanks to Ghita and Erik; light fruit aroma,red, clear, white foam, light sweetness, lightly bitter, light body, light soft fruit dry finish.

(from) Can. Aroma is artificial lemon and red freuits, some energydrink notes. Bad stuff. Flavour is very artificial lemon, red fruits, some energy notes again, chemical, nasty guarana flavour. The regular stuff at least reminds of beer and has it’s positive point on a hot day. This is just pure crap.
Colour is pink/red, hazy. Has a white head, mostly diminishing. Aroma is fruity, apricot, artificial sweet. Flavor is sweet too. Light astringent. Soft carbonation.
Bottle from Intermarche Supermarket, Les Charmilles, France. A red beer with no head. It has chemical cherry and strawberry flavours with a tart pleasant red fruity finish.

Can 500ml (PBF, BB 03/2013)

Clear golden and pinky color, small steady pinky head. Fruity, berryish, rasberry aroma, very artifical, Light bodied. Sweet, acidic, rasberry, strawberry. Energy drink not a beer.
Canned@PBF2012. Amber colour, small pinkish head. Aroma is straberries, guarana and some other fruity notes. Flavour is artificial red berries along with some guarana/energydrink notes.

Redish color whit somewhat red colored foam head. The foam head is about the only good thing of this ’beer’. Aroma is sweet, taste is like a sweet soda, aftertaste is sweet. Not my cup of beer. Never, never again. (Strasbourg 201207)

Trochę lepszy od wersji podstawowej. Rozgrzewa za sprawą guarany i zawartej w nim kofeinie. Obficie musujące, szemrzące bąbelki utrzymują się dość długo. Intensywny czerwony kolor i dość obfita piana jak na musujący napój.
Bottle. Tastes better than  standard desperados. Little else positive. To sweet.

Das Getränk sieht chemisch rot aus, und die Schaumkrone hält mittelmäßig lange. Geschmacklich wirkt es für mich ziemlich künstlich was an den Cachaca und Gurana liegen könnte. Dies ist sicherlich nichts was man als "Biertrinker" trinkt sondern auf jedenfall ein Partygetränk, dafür ist es allerdings ziemlich gut. Insgesamt ist es ziemlich Zitrusartig und zuckrig-bitter, den tequila schmeckt man ein bisschen herraus. Im Nachgeschmack ist es ein bisschen zuckrig und etwas herb. Fazit: Für ein Bier hätte es diese Noten bekommen : -/2/3/1/-/3, da es aber Erfrischend und auch nicht als richtiges Bier sondern als Partygetränk gedacht ist, gebe ich diese Noten. Es schmeckt um einiges besser als das normale Desperados!
	
Test vom 26.9.2009, Gebinde: Glasflasche 	Noten: 9,10,9,10,10,9 - 9,35

Backlog Paris autumn 2011

Amber color, good foam
Intense artificial aromas..

Wonder why I bought this one... It was as awful as suspected

Can (500ml):

Red to pink colour with a pretty thick looking, foamy white head.


Very sweet on the nose with lots of sugar, some citrus and touches of lemon along with lots of red berries. As you would expect, it is a fruity smelling beer and very similar to a summer fruits juice or fruit punch.


Sweet like the smell suggested and with some sugar and red grapes with some grenadine too. There is a bit of spice and a touch of citrus on top of that.


Smooth and very sweet with lots of sugar. The body is light but not quite thin and there is moderate to strong carbonation without the usual gas.



This one was a better than expected beer with a strange but different colour to it and tonnes of sweetness and sugar. It was artificially summary and sweet with a nice refreshing taste.



1001 Beers Blog:

Bottle, 33 cl - Clear red beer with a small white head. Aroma is fruity with notes of strawberry, hay and some artificial berries. Flavor is fruity with notes of strawberry, corn and some tequila. Better than expected, but I would like to know how much beer they’ve actually added to this.

330 ml bottle in Dakar, Senegal. Pours a clear red-amber color with an off white head. Sweet and fruity aroma. Sweet and artificial fruity flavor. Palate is tart and sweet. Kind of need for a mixed drink but a terrible beer.
Can courtesy Sdr. Borup. Frothy white good mostly lasting head. Red-yellow colour. Light malty and hoppy aroma. Light bitter flavor. Short light bitter finish. Watery palate. Bad stuff.
Can. Nice head with good duration. Color is orange. Aroma and taste are lime, guarana, fruits and malt.

Boîte 50 cl du Casino de Cannes-La Bocca (F). Ce qui vient d’abord à l’esprit, c’est .. limonade. Goût d’orange sanguine, relent de tequila et savon. Avec sucre, concentré de fruit, guarana, tequila, cachaça, acidifiant et antioxydant, on se demande s’il reste de la place pour la bière. Chef d’Oeuvre de la "grande consommation", cette mixture devrait à peine tenter de rivaliser avec les alcopops.

Can bought in Lattes France, consumed in La Grande Motte 2010-08-10
AR: redfizzy berries, when poured smell a bit like pink grape tonic
AP: cherry red, high pink head that diminshing down to 0,5 cm
F: sweet plesent beverage, grape tonic, sourness, apple, cherries
Is this really beer?

Can 50cl. A reddish ale with a pink head ! Smell is sugary and syrupy. The first tastes are not bad with medium body but quickly some acid aroma is coming near Gini or Indian Schweppes soda that leads to an ugly feeling when arriving at the end of the can. Anyway a bit better that expected, small notes of hop at the finish but too much lemon acid in it, very alcoholic, not very drinkable.
Bottle@Home. A mediocre strong lager polluted with artificial colours and flavours. Pretty yuck! Oh, and way too sweet too.

Can.
Pours an average red with no pizazz; sure, nice head at first but like most macro (stuff) it fades quickly.  Aroma is malty Hawaiian Fruit Punch.  Flavor is the same.  Average mouthfeel.  Not terrible.

Tasting at Papsø, can
Reddish, hazy color. Soapy aroma, with light fruits, lemonade, berries. Sweet berry lemonade, with a more citrusy finish and light bitterness in the end. Bad of course.
